title: "Amazon offers developers AWS credits, reduces its cut of their apps revenue"
excerpt: "Amazon has joined the app-platform pack in reducing the cut it takes from smaller developers who use the Amazon Appstore to distribute apps. But it's taking a slightly different approach, one that entices developers to use Amazon Web Services (AWS) for IT infrastructure and AI services."
